RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 23, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON FOUR RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOPPING chased early on, took over into turn, drew clear held sway to the wire under good hancling. MUSTANG WILLIE no speed from outside to turn, rallied along stretch run too late. UNCAPTURED PULSE brief speed, dueled to turn, chased for show spot. NO COMMISSION raced along evenly with no late kick in the stretch run. VENICE BEACH through early with no late response in the stretch run. BEACH FRONT never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Mustang Willie
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Lerios Virginia
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed from outside to turn, rallied along stretch run too late

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Pulse
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Lerios Virginia
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, dueled to turn, chased for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: No Commission
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Venice Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early with no late response in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Beach Front
ENTRY.COMMENT: never threatened

ENTRY.NAME: Topping
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early on, took over into turn, drew clear held sway

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Michael E. Lauer & Penny S. Lauer

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1 1/16M Turf CR: 97. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 23, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Suc h A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000). (If transferred to the Main Tra ck, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUTHORITARIAN quick to the front to set all pace while well handled throughout in track record time to the wire. INDOCUMENTADO unhurried to far turn, late run in the stretch best of rest. ONE LUCKY DAY chased winner to far turn, weakened for show spot at wire. LUCK OF THE DRAW raced along evenly with no late response when needed. KNIGHT'S CROSS through early, never menaced from the half. HOLIDAY DANCER never menaced throughout. DRAFT CAPITAL raced a four wide trip to far turn while fading back readily. NO HANG CHARLIE tried to keep up between horses into far turn, gave way readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Authoritarian
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to front, set all pace well handled in track record time

ENTRY.NAME: One Lucky Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to far turn, weakened for show spot at wire

ENTRY.NAME: No Hang Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up between horses into far turn, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Draft Capital
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced a four wide trip to far turn while fading back readily

ENTRY.NAME: Knight's Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, never menaced from the half

ENTRY.NAME: Luck of the Draw
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Holiday Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Indocumentado
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to far turn, late run in the stretch best of rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 23, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Re gistered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT HURRICANE broke sharp while outsprinted, chased to the turn, took over and cleared into the stretch while ridden out to the wire in a solid effort. NAVY CROSS unhurried early, three wide run past the quarter pole and kept on the place spot while best of the rest. HILLBILLY LOGIC inside positioning throughout while on for show spot to wire. HENDRIX between horses early, steadied into to turn and leveled off with no gain in the stretch run. EL GAVILAN rushed between horses to the lead, dueled into turn but gave way readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Hillbilly Logic
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside positioning throughout while for show spot to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Hendrix
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses early, steadied to turn, leveled off no gain

ENTRY.NAME: El Gavilan
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed between horses to the lead, dueled turn, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Hurricane
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp outsprinted, chased, took over, cleared, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Navy Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, three wide run quarter pole, on the place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DUDLEY quick to the front dictated all pace while ridden out to the wire under good handling. WHEREWEGOIN saved ground throughout for place spot while no match bested rest. FIRING RANGE tracked to the half, chased to deep stretch, outbid for show spot. DOWN HOME KITTEN always trailed from off rail throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Wherewegoin
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout for place spot while no match bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Firing Range
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked to the half, chased to deep stretch, outbid for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Down Home Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed from off rail throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Dudley
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front dictated all pace while ridden out to the wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 84. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 23, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Al lowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Any Maiden Races, And Only Claiming Races And Only Starter Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $12,500). (I f transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUIERO MAS tracking between horses to backstretch dueled to the stretch, roused and cleared to the wire. LADY JENNEVIERE no speed to far turn, rallied into stretch and closing the gap too late. KING'S LEGACY off rail run in the stretch, nailed on the line for place spot. ABITIBI brief speed inside while fading back at the half and stretch. DICHOTOMY chased leader early on, led at the half, dueled to stretch while empty in the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Abitibi
ENTRY.OWNER: Esquivel Maria and Esquivel Jose Jesus
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed inside while fading back at the half and stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Quiero Mas
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracking between horses to backstretch dueled stretch, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: King's Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run in the stretch, nailed on the line for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Dichotomy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader early on, led at the half, dueled to stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jenneviere
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, rallied into stretch closing the gap

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 23. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGH SPEED rushed inside to the front, led all calls while handily to the wire. HOLDONTOYOURTIARA pressured winner to quarter pole, no match stretch held place. SHESMYBROKER no speed to the turn, rallied along for show spot in the stretch. SHEZA HOOT sharp break, could not keep up to the turn, leveled off stretch. HERO OF THE BEST could not keep up off rail to stretch, faded back in the lane. ANCIENT BROWN through after a half and dropped back readily in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: High Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed inside to the front, led all calls while handily to wire

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Frank Coniglio, Robert Kent Johnson,Frank Ferrogine & Rich

ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, rallied along for show spot in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 44. Claiming Purse 12000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEEBLEGEE lagged back to the turn, rallied outside into stretch, ran off while ridden out to the finish. NANA ROZE sprinted clear to turn, hooked in stretch while no match for the winner and stayed on as best of the rest. TREASURE WILBURNYA raced along evenly from inside with no late response in the lane. SWEETER THAN HONEY off a bit tardy and never factored throughout. REYS PINA COLADA inside speed early on, chased to turn, weakened back in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Treasure Wilburnya
ENTRY.OWNER: Eyerman, Lee J. and Molumby, John
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from inside with no late response in the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Beeblegee
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged back to the turn, rallied outside into stretch, ran off

ENTRY.NAME: Reys Pina Colada
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed early on, chased to turn, weakened back stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Sweeter Than Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: off a bit tardy and never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Nana Roze
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear to turn, hooked in stretch, no match, stayed 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 85. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 23, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Re gistered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,250). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUANITA'S EXPRESS saved ground to the stretch, ran into traffic,n deep stretch, angled out for room to race along in time with a gutsy effort and heady ride in the final eighth of a mile. SUPREME SONG chased pace to far turn, brief lead late stretch but outgamed to the wire. PANORAMA TRUCK speed to the front, stayed to eighth pole weakened late for show. EDEN PARADISE good position to the half, shuffled back into far turn, mildly. FUTURE VICTORY raced back to far turn, moved up from quarter pole in tons of traffic in the final sixteenth to the wire improving in the final stages..UNDISMAYED raced along evenly with no late kick in the stretch run. DIGITAL SOFTWARE inside trip to far turn while evenly in the stretch run. DAY IN THE COUNTRY raced along evenly to far turn with a three wide bid but flattenedout and faded back. CRIMINAL DEFENSE never prominent throughout. CINDY'S STORM dropped back readily. SENSE SHINES through after half, gave way with little resistance. MIDNIGHT TEQUILA bobbled at the start, savded ground throughout while blocked past the quarter pole inisde while on empty in the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Criminal Defense
ENTRY.COMMENT: never prominent throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Day in the Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along even to far turn racing three wide past quarter pole

ENTRY.NAME: Panorama Truck
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, stayed to eighth pole weakened late for show

ENTRY.NAME: Digital Software
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to far turn while evenly in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Undismayed
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly inside with a stretch run in traffic to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Juanita's Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to stretch, blocked, angled out for room in time

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Ashleigh Stud Farm, Pamela Deegan & JoeDeegan

ENTRY.NAME: Supreme Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to far turn, brief lead late stretch, outgamed wire

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Tequila
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled at the start, saved ground, blocked quarter pole empty

ENTRY.NAME: Eden Paradise
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to the half, shuffled back into far turn, mildly

ENTRY.NAME: Cindy's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail trip, trouble at the quarter pole shuffled back empty

ENTRY.NAME: Sense Shines
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half, gave way with little reasistance

ENTRY.NAME: Future Victory
ENTRY.OWNER: Riley Barbara Ouzts Toni and Mattingly David H
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed from the gate, finished well in heavy traffic to wire
